data.taskTitle: Add Monaco Editor theme sync with DaisyUI theme
Add Monaco Editor theme sync with DaisyUI theme
data.approach: Will subscribe to the theme preference store in MonacoWrapper and map DaisyUI themes to Monaco vs-dark or vs-light based on theme category

data.taskTitle: Add Monaco Editor theme sync with DaisyUI theme
summary: Added dark theme detection for 12 DaisyUI themes (dark, synthwave, halloween, forest, black, luxury, dracula, night, coffee, dim, sunset, business)
Created getMonacoTheme() function that maps DaisyUI themes to Monaco vs-dark or vs-light
Added MutationObserver to MonacoWrapper that watches data-theme attribute changes
Monaco Editor theme now auto-syncs when user changes DaisyUI theme

filesModified.description: Added DARK_THEMES set, isDarkTheme(), and getMonacoTheme() functions
Added MutationObserver for theme sync, effectiveTheme derived state

reviewFocus: Verify dark theme list is accurate (12 themes classified as dark)
Monaco theme prop still works for manual override (passing theme prop bypasses auto-sync)

summary: Added isDarkTheme() and getMonacoTheme() to themeManager.ts
Added MutationObserver to MonacoWrapper.svelte for live theme detection
Monaco Editor now auto-syncs between vs-dark and vs themes
